name: sports-league-management-system
description: Sports League Management System - Flask Application

scripts.db-shell: docker-compose exec db psql -U sports_league_owner -d sports_league
scripts.create-org: docker-compose exec web flask org:create --name "Demo League" --slug demo --admin-email admin@demo.com --admin-password password123
scripts.seed-demo: docker-compose exec web flask seed:demo --org demo
scripts.export-data: docker-compose exec web flask export:season --season $SEASON_ID --what all
scripts.test: docker-compose exec web python -m pytest tests/

author: SLMS Development Team

dependencies.note: This is a Python Flask application. See requirements.txt for Python dependencies.
